About Me

Passionate about building secure and trustworthy AI systems

Background

Published researcher and AI practitioner with 3+ years of experience building and operating enterprise-scale fraud detection systems for major Indonesian financial institutions. Combines deep domain expertise in financial security with hands-on machine learning engineering, having developed production ML pipelines processing millions of real-time transactions.

Current Focus

I'm currently working on a 30-day portfolio journey demonstrating my expertise in federated learning security, with projects spanning from fraud detection baselines to advanced cryptographic verification systems.

Research Goals

  • Develop Byzantine-resilient federated learning systems
  • Create privacy-preserving ML for financial applications
  • Advance verifiable AI using cryptographic methods
  • Bridge the gap between research and production ML
